member.summary: Sends directory over Sslstream
member.param: Stops transfer when any file transfer failed, if true. if false it ignores files that couldn't be send
Sometimes connection crashes after file info is sent, inverval can be set to prevent this issue from happenning Higher = slower transfer, smaller chance to fail 20ms by default
